c371g2.ltc_safety

Class AbstractNetworkViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • c371g2.ltc_safety.AbstractNetworkViewModel

  • public abstract class AbstractNetworkViewModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class extended by each ViewModel that performs a network operation. MainViewModel: Concern fetching (updating statuses). NewConcernViewModel: Concern submission. ConcernDetailViewModel: Concern retraction.
    Invariants:
    signalLatch is always non-null.
    History Properties:
    signalLatch.value() only decreases but is never negative.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.ref.WeakReference<AbstractNetworkActivity> activityWeakReference
      Reference to the Activity class which initialized this class.
      java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch signalLatch
      Used to inform a test class that a network operation has been completed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract void stopNetworkThread()
      Called in the onDestroy method of an AbstractNetworkActivity to end any threads running prior to destroying the activity that thread was created in.
